com.frostphyr.avail

Class ToStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frostphyr.avail.ToStringBuilder

  • public class ToStringBuilder
extends Object
    A utility builder class to simplify the creation of a String for Object.toString().

    The builder uses a class name and any number of name-value pairs. The format of the output is:

    ClassName[name=value,arrayName=[value,value]]

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • forClassName

        public static ToStringBuilder forClassName(String className)
        Creates a new ToStringBuilder for the specified className.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the Class whose toString() is being built; cannot be null

      • forClass

        public static ToStringBuilder forClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Creates a new ToStringBuilder for the specified Class. This creates a ToStringBuilder from Class.getSimpleName().
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Class whose toString() is being built; cannot be null

      • append

        public ToStringBuilder append(String name,
                              Object value)
        Appends the specified name-value pair. The value's toString() method is used for the textual representation. If the value is null, "null" will be used.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the value; cannot be null
        value - the value to append
        Returns:
        this ToStringBuilder for chaining

        value - the value to append
        Returns:
        this ToStringBuilder for chaining
